subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carolyn Thomas, whose father, the Hall of Famer Walter Johnson, won 417 games for the Senators from 1907 to 1927, is a link between Washington and its baseball past.
snippet: Carolyn Thomas, whose father, the Hall of Famer Walter Johnson, won 417 games for the Senators from 1907 to 1927, is a link between Washington and its baseball past.
